overview: A poor young boy falls for a chorus girl after he finds out that she is not like the "loose women" she works with. He determines to get her to leave the immoral show-business life and marry him.
tagline: A STORY OF A CHORUS GIRL'S LIFE, WITH THE LITTLE SIDELIGHTS OF THE STAGE THAT ARE ALWAYS INTERESTING TO OUTSIDERS- THEY CALLED HER "THE ICEBERG" BECAUSE SHE WAS INDIFFERENT TO THE ATTENTIONS OF MEN.
title: The Reward
